script.name: PCC Staff Image - PAYLOAD v2 - TESTING MODE
script.info:
Uses DEP Notify Starter Script
https://github.com/jamf/DEPNotify-Starter
script.notes:
Created 12/05/2019 By Yeshua Ervine ========================= Modified 10/04/2021 - EB - Removed Firefox, Adobe Air, Adobe Flash, and Java - Changed to install Kace agent v11
Modified 11/06/2020 - Changed firefox trigger from installfirefoxESR to installfirefox
Modified 11/06/2020 - Changed Registration Window flag from True to False. Means payload will run without user input.
Modified 11/06/2020 - Changed Computer Name requirement from Mandatory to Optional
Modified 05/19/2020 - Added MS Office 2019 Trigger Policy
Modified 02/28/2020 - Adding McAfee Agent Trigger Policy compatible with Mac OS Catalina
